attributes.action: explain to the people the differences between the Lisbon Treaty and the failed EU Constitution, since he has committed the nation to the Treaty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
provide an explanation to the people of the differences between the Lisbon Treaty and the failed EU Constitution, since he has committed the nation to
the Treaty.'

rejection.details: We can not accept petitions requesting the PM "explain" something as this is not considered a valid action. Please use a more direct request in your title and resubmit.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
